name: Abating Link

description: When Damaged:+5% Resistance to that Damage Type for 10s. Stacks up to 90%.

name: Adhesive Blast
description: Grenades have 17% chance to stick to surfaces.

name: Agility Drift
description: Reduces damage by 2% when Airborne.,+1% Evasion

name: Ambush
description: When Ghost invisibility is broken, Shade's owner is granted +30% Weapon Damage for 3s.

name: Ammo Case
description: Increases Ammo Capacity by 5% and converts Ammo Pickups into ammo for equipped weapons after 5s.

name: Anticipation
description: Immune to Knockdown for an additional +1s after being Knocked Down.,Immune to Stagger for an additional +1s after being Staggered.

name: Antimatter Absorb

name: Antimatter Mine
description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after 12s or within enemy proximity.

name: Apex Predator
description: On Hit:,Reveals target on Minima﻿p f﻿or +1s.

description: +5% Damage Resistance during Bullet Jump,+0 Mobility

name: Armored Recovery
description: +12.5% Damage Resistance when Knocked Down,-5% Slide

name: Arrow Mutation
description: Converts unused ammo pickups into Arrows. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Astral Autopsy
description: Fatal strikes against an enemy also perform a Codex Scan. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.

name: Avenging Truth
description: Blocking absorbs 20% of incoming damage, stored as extra damage for the next charge attack.,+0.3 'Truth'

name: Battering Maneuver
description: +3% to Bullet Jump,+3% Aim Glide and Wall Latch,+10% <DT_IMPACT>Impact on Bullet Jump

description: Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more Melee Damage.

name: Berserker
description: +5% Attack Speed (Max: 75%) for 4s on Critical Hit

description: On Kill:+20% Critical Damage when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Blind Justice

name: Radiant Finish
description: Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more Finisher Damage.

name: Rage
description: Convert +10% of Damage on Health to Energy

name: Razorwing Blitz
description: Razorwing Augment: Flight Speed increased by 25% and Fire Rate increased by 25% for 2s when using abilities. Stacks up to 4x.

name: Reaping Chakram
description: Blazing Chakram Augment: Each enemy hit increases the ring's Damage by 1.25x and the chance for enemies to drop Health Orbs on death by +0.10x.

name: Reaping Spiral
description: Far flung attacks and multi-hit combos.

name: Reawaken
description: Upon death, automatically revives itself after 165s.

name: Recharge Barrier
description: Electric Shield Augment: Allies that pass through have 35 Shields restored.

name: Recover
description: On Kill:+3.8 Heal Rate for 2.5s,-6.2% from Health Orbs

name: Recuperate
description: On Kill:+3.8 Heal Rate for 2.5s,-6.2% from Health Orbs

name: Reflect
description: Adarza Kavat has a 10% chance to reflect damage back to an enemy, amplifying it by 15%.

name: Reflection
description: 16% Damage taken is reflected when Blocking attacks while Channeling.

name: Regen
description: If killed, regenerates 1x with 58% Max Health and is invulnerable for 1s.

name: Regenerative Molt
description: Molt Augment: After casting Molt, Saryn regenerates 20 Health/s for 10s.

name: Reinforcing Stomp
description: Rhino Stomp Augment: Iron Skin Health is replenished by 55 for each enemy affected.

name: Relentless Combination
description: +25% chance to increas﻿e Mele﻿e Counter when <DT_SLASH>Slash Status deals damage.

name: Rending Crane
description: Downward cuts with an impact combo.

name: Rending Turn
description: +3% to Bullet Jump,+3% Aim Glide and Wall Latch,+10% <DT_SLASH>Slash on Bullet Jump

name: Repeater Clip
description: On Reload:+17.5% Fire Rate when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Repelling Bastille
description: Bastille Augment: Enemies within the Bastille have a 50% chance to be repelled every 4s.

name: Resonance
description: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting their weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

name: Resonating Quake
description: Sound Quake Augment: Forgoes channeling to create a shockwave that deals 10x Damage at the epicenter, gradually weakening as it expands out.

name: Retribution
description: +15% Chance to deal Electrical Damage when shield struck by melee enemies.,+20 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity

name: Retrieve
description: The kubrow sniffs out loot hidden in crates and dropped by enemies within 10m, retrieving these items for its master.

name: Revenge
description: Sentinel will not attack an enemy unless that enemy has attacked the Sentinel's master within 5.8m.

name: Rifle Ammo Mutation
description: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Rifle Scavenger
description: Increased Rifle Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup

name: Rift Strike
description: Charge attacks now step through the rift to attack enemies up to 5m away

name: Rift Torrent
description: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.

name: Rising Storm
description: Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.

name: Rolling Guard
description: On Dodge:Become invulnerable for 2s and remove all Status Effects. 12s cooldown.

name: Rumbled
description: Rumblers Augment: Atlas becomes a Rumbler with Rock Armor that can absorb up to 350 Damage.

name: Sacrifice
description: Sentinel takes 7s to revive its downed owner to 25% health and shields, destroying itself after the process.

name: Safeguard
description: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.

name: Safeguard Switch
description: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3s.

name: Sanctuary
description: Creates a shield with 100 Health around the player when they are reviving fallen allies.

name: Sapping Reach
description: Pull Augment: Steals up to 10 Energy from the target.

name: Savage Silence
description: Silence Augment: Finisher Damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.

name: Savagery
description: Allows the Kubrow to use Finisher attacks on an enemy.,+20% Finisher Damage

name: Savior Decoy
description: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases Casting Speed of Decoy by 20%

name: Scan Matter
description: Resource containers within 15m are revealed on the Minimap for 2s every 30s.

name: Scavenge
description: +15% chance for the pet to pry open a locked locker.

name: Seeking Shuriken
description: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their Armor by 35% for 2s.

name: Self Destruct
description: Explodes on death, dealing 100 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage in a 3m radius and knocking down nearby enemies.

name: Sense Danger
description: The Kavat alerts their master of nearby enemies.

name: Sharpened Bullets
description: On Kill:+12.5% Critical Damage when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Sharpened Claws
description: A vicious attack dealing 150% damage that sunders armor by 30% and rends flesh.

name: Shattering Storm
description: Methodical strikes and high impact combos.

name: Shelter
description: Creates a shield with 100 Health around the player when they are reviving fallen allies.

name: Shield Charger
description: Increases Max Shields by 10% and Shield Regeneration by 10% for 5s.

name: Shield Of Shadows
description: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Each Shadow within 50m take 3% of the Damage done to Nekros in his stead.

name: Shield Overload
description: Polarize Augment: Increases the time for the target's Shields to regenerate by 4s.

name: Shimmering Blight
description: Fast spinning attacks and staggering strikes.

name: Shock Trooper
description: Shock Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Shocking Speed
description: Speed Augment: Enemies touched while sprinting under the effects of Speed will take 75 <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage with guaranteed proc.

name: Shotgun Ammo Mutation
description: Converts unused ammo pickups into Shotgun ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Shotgun Scavenger
description: Increased Shotgun Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup

name: Shrapnel Shot
description: On Kill:+16.5% Critical Damage when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Shred
description: +5% Fire Rate (x2 for Bows),+0.2 Punch Through

name: Signal Flare
description: Radial Blind Augment: Enemies blinded are marked on the Minimap for 3s.

name: Silent Battery
description: Reduces the chance an enemy will hear gunfire by 25%.

name: Singularity
description: Absorb Augment: Creates a ring every 3s that drags in enemies at 9m/s.

name: Sinking Talon
description: Strong, focused attacks with multi-hit spins.

name: Slay Board
description: On Directional Dismount:,Board is launched, dealing 50 Damage while slicing enemies.

name: Slicing Feathers
description: Twirling, acrobatic slashes with a refined touch.

name: Smite Infusion
description: Smite Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_RADIATION>Radiation Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Smoke Shadow
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2s.

name: Sniper Ammo Mutation
description: Converts unused ammo pickups into Sniper ammo. Pistol/Rifle <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun <AMMO_MUTATION> 3.

name: Sniper Scavenger
description: Increased Sniper Ammo recovery.,+25% Ammo Pickup

name: Sonic Boost
description: Every 40s, boosting will release a shockwave, stunning enemies in 1m.

name: Sonic Fracture
description: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy Armor is reduced by 35% for 2s.

name: Soul Survivor
description: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% Health. Nekros's Energy will be consumed.

name: Sovereign Outcast
description: An outlandish style with sweeping attacks.

name: Spare Parts
description: +7.5% Rare Item Drop Chance On Death

name: Speed Holster
description: Increases weapon draw and holstering speed.,+20% Holster Speed

name: Spring-Loaded Blade
description: +5% Weapon Range for 4s on Status Effect.

name: Spring-Loaded Broadhead
description: Increase damage by +40%,if the target is over 45m away.

name: Spring-Loaded Chamber
description: On Reload:+12.5% Fire Rate when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Staggering Shield
description: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.

name: Stalk
description: The kubrow cloaks itself and its master to stalk down its prey when they are within 14m.

name: Stand Ground
description: Blocking reduces damage taken from enemy abilities by 10%.

name: Static Discharge
description: Charge Attacks electrify nearby enemies for <DT_ELECTRICITY>Electricity Damage equal to 30% of weapon damage.

name: Steel Charge
description: Melee Weapon damage increased.,+10% Melee Damage

name: Sudden Justice
description: On 2 Hits within 0.2s:+7.5% Fire Rate for 0.5s

name: Sundering Weave
description: Steady chopping strikes with focused damage.

name: Suppress
description: Reduces the chance an enemy will hear gunfire by 25%.

name: Surging Dash
description: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your Melee Counter by 1.

name: Surplus Diverters
description: Gain +1 energy, upon replenishing shields completely after they have been deactivated.

name: Swing Line
description: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no Energy cost while Airborne.

name: Swipe
description: Strikes 1 additional enemies and increases Attack Range by 0.5m.

name: Sword Alone
description: With Melee Equipped:,+2.5% Mobility,+0.3 Sprint Speed

name: Synth Charge
description: +50% Bonus Damage on final shot. Requires Magazine 6 or higher.

name: Synth Deconstruct
description: Enemies injured by the Sentinel have 2% chance to drop a Health Orb when killed.

name: Synth Fiber
description: Health Orbs increase Armor for Sentinel by 25% for 3s.

name: Target Fixation
description: Tail Wind Augment: Each enemy hit increases Tail Wind Damage by 30%. Damage resets upon landing.

name: Targeting Receptor
description: Causes the Helios Sentinel to attack targets within 10m with 1 glaives.

name: Targeting Subsystem
description: On Hit:+5% Accuracy when Aiming for 1.5s

name: Tear Gas
description: Smoke Screen Augment: Blinds enemies within 1m for 3s.

name: Tectonic Fracture
description: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% Health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.

name: Tek Assault
description: Kavat has 15% chance to ignore Lethal Damage and be immune for 1s.

name: Tek Collateral
description: Increased Pistol Ammo recovery.,+25% Critical Damage when inside the Marked Zone.

name: Tek Gravity
description: Slam Attacks in the Marked Zone pull all enemies within 6m.

name: Territorial Aggression
description: The Kavat marks their territory, pacifying any wild creature within it.

name: Tesla Link
description: Tesla Augment: Every pair of Teslas will connect forming a beam that will cause 100 <DT_SLASH>Slash Damage when contacted.

name: Tether Grenades
description: Grenades tether up to 2 enemies from 4m away.

name: Thermagnetic Shells
description: Enemies explode on death, dealing 20 <DT_MAGNETIC>Magnetic Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1.5m radius.

name: Thief'S Wit
description: Highlights mods through the environment as well as the Minimap.,+7 Loot Radar

name: Thrash Landing
description: Landing a trick releases an explosion dealing 10% Trick Score <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage to enemies within 1m.

name: Thumper
description: Djinn will attack the first visible enemy within 35m.

name: Thundermiter
description: +25% chance charged Projectiles explode,-15% Magazine Capacity

name: Tidal Impunity
description: Tidal Surge Augment: Clears Status Effects and grants 3s of Proc Immunity for yourself and allies that come in contact with it.

name: Titanic Rumbler
description: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% Health, 120% Damage, and 50% Speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.

name: Total Eclipse
description: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3m gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.

name: Toxic Flight
description: +2.2% to Bullet Jump,+2.2% Aim Glide and Wall Latch,+25% <DT_POISON>Toxin on Bullet Jump

name: Trail Blazer
description: Tricks leave a trail inflicting 10 <DT_FIRE>Heat Damage to enemies.

name: Trample
description: The Helminth Charger rushes an enemy, dealing 35 Damage to all in its path.

name: Transistor Shield
description: Electric Shield Augment: Allies can pick up Electric Shield. 25% of damage absorbed will be added to Volt's Static Discharge.

name: Twirling Spire
description: A mix of sweeping attacks with precise strikes.

name: Unleashed
description: The kubrow grapples a VIP target within 35m, forcing them to the ground.

name: Vacuum
description: 6.5m Companion Gather-Link. Detects and collects items, including mods.

name: Vampire Leech
description: Energy Vampire Augment: Excess Energy replenishes Shields by 85%.

name: Vanquished Prey
description: On Kill:-25% Shield Recharge Delay for 2.5s,-6.2% from Health Orbs

name: Vaporize
description: Sentinel will deal 150 Damage to an enemy within 2.3m.

name: Venom Dose
description: Spores Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% <DT_CORROSIVE>Corrosive Damage to their attacks for 28s.

name: Vexing Retaliation
description: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 Damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a <DT_PUNCTURE>Puncture Proc while Health damage will cause a <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Proc.

name: Vigilante Supplies
description: Converts unused Ammo Pickups into Primary Weapon Ammo. Pistol <AMMO_MUTATION> 1 and Shotgun/Sniper <AMMO_MUTATION> 2.

name: Vigorous Swap
description: On Equip:+15% Damage for 3s+15% Holster Speed

name: Vile Precision
description: -10% Weapon Recoil,-6% Fire Rate (x2 for Bows)

name: Voltage Sequence
description: Killing a flying enemy creates a lightning trap from their remains, lasting 2s,+0.3 'Sequence'

name: Vulcan Blitz
description: Enemies explode on death, dealing 50 <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast Damage (+10% Enemy Max Health) in a 1m radius.

name: Ward Recovery
description: Warding Halo Augment: 35% of the casting cost returned based on how much protection is left.

name: Warding Thurible
description: Thurible Augment: Allies in range take 15% less Damage while channeling Thurible and grant 0.2 additional Energy charge whenever damaged.
